task.title: Volume Detail - Snapshots
task.shortdesc: This page shows you the details for a volume's snapshots.

task.title: Snapshots
task.shortdesc: This section allows you to view and manage snapshots associated with the volume.

step.cmd: Click the Create a snapshot icon to display the Create snapshot from volume dialog.

task.title: Context menu actions
task.shortdesc: Each tile in the snapshots list has a context menu. Clicking the action icon in the upper right corner of a volume tile brings up a menu of actions that you can perform on the selected snapshot.

taskbody.context: The following context menu actions are available:

step.cmd: This item will bring up the snapshot detail page.

This item allows you to register the selected snapshot as an image in your cloud, if it was created from a volume containing a root file system. The image can then be used to launch EBS-backed instances.
This item allows you to delete a snapshot.
